duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist therapists and therapy assistants with patient-care related duties, including patient treatment area set-up/cleaning, equipment set-up/cleaning, patient transport, and patient comfort measures.
Assist Therapy support staff with reception and clerical duties as needed.
Participate in staff meetings, caregiver orientation, and other gatherings as requested by Manager.
Keep treatment areas clean and supplies available while adhering to department cleaning schedule and logs activities done.
Perform inventory activities, work with administrative specialist to order needed supplies, and maintain and clean equipment and supplies.
Assist with the department's readiness for patient care in the morning and perform closing duties to keep the department organized.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's degree preferred)
Current American Heart Association BLS (Basic Life Support) certification
